headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Experience The First Dose
content:
If you haven’t taken the plunge yet, experience The First Dose.

Head straight to Blaine County and answer a call from Ron Jakowski to get started with the opening chapter of the saga.

Along the way, you’ll gain access to The Freakshop as a base of operations, set up a mobile Acid Lab business, and distribute your product throughout Los Santos while undermining competitors.
